profile.intro: Hi, I'm Linda, a Full Stack Developer based in France.
profile.specialization: I specialize in the JavaScript ecosystem, primarily working with React to create interactive user interfaces and Node.js to handle server-side logic. This dual expertise allows me to design complete solutions, with a strong focus on performance, user experience, and code quality.
profile.career: My journey, atypical and self-taught, led me to development‚Äîa field where I find daily motivation: solving technical problems, bringing ideas to life through code, and constantly exploring new approaches and methods.

hobbies.title: When I'm Not Coding
hobbies.description: When I'm not in front of my editor, I closely follow the latest developments in technology, especially artificial intelligence, cybersecurity, and 3D printing. To recharge, I enjoy spending time in nature through hiking and savor quiet moments with reading (novels, biographies, personal development‚Ä¶).
